Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine beige; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 181 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes (2015) 142.)
Curator's comments: Name Agemachos. Same die is used in an unpublished example from the Athenian Agora.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (50)
